thread.title: The last high: One more blast before you tie the knot
thread.title_full: The last high: One more blast before you tie the knot - timesofindia-economictimes

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: The last high: One more blast before you tie the knot
text:
Music and dance â€” let your bachelor and bachelorette vacation be a blend of nothing but joy.
Dance away: Getting together with neighbours and hosting a street party can just add the right amount of fun to your bachelor/hen party in London

Music to the ears: Budapest offers year round entertainment in the form of concerts, exhibitions, festivals, cultural events and fairs.

Learn a move or two: Head to Brazil , the Samba capital of the world with your friends. There are several schools in Rio de Janeiro that teach you the moves.

Brewing along: Amsterdam is a popular choice among youngsters for their bachelor party. The beautiful city has several local breweries

Street fare: Just a few hours away from India, Macau is full of surprises, adventure sports and interesting cuisine

Art buffs: Romania's capital city of Bucharest is known for its dynamic, energetic and funky streak. Plan your bachelor/hen party in this city, where during the day you visit museums and cultural centres and party hard at night!
